name: Sorin, Lord of Innistrad
text: +1: Create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token with lifelink.↵−2: You get an emblem with 'Creatures you control get +1/+0.'↵−6: Destroy up to three target creatures and/or other planeswalkers. Return each card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control.
